desc: Now available without prescription, the Skinny Up!® product line is changing lives. layout.text: The Skinny Up!® product line is changing lives for the better.  Skinny Up!® products, previously only available through a doctor, can access stored nutrition from fat that tends to linger in your midsection. This can aid in dramatic weight loss while providing nutrition to the organs and glands important for the weight loss and detox processes.*  In addition, sugar cravings, often detrimental to one’s success, are effectively reduced.
